arts.ttl: Fenerbahce appeal Mourinho's four-game ban after Galatasaray fall-out
arts.sum: Fenerbahce have confirmed to Sky Sports News they have appealed Jose Mourinho's four-game ban, which was handed to the head coach after the fallout from Monday's goalless draw against rivals Galatasaray.

arts.ttl: Victor Osimhen transfer latest: Galatasaray striker issues update amid Man United, Arsenal links as Napoli chief makes fresh claim
arts.sum: Victor Osimhen delivers an update on his future at Galatasaray amid reported interest from clubs including Manchester United and Arsenal.

arts.ttl: Drogba defends Mourinho as Fenerbahce boss threatens to SUE Galatasaray
arts.sum: Fenerbahce manager Jose Mourinho, the biggest critic of domestic referees, praised Vincinc in his post-match press conference and quipped that he told the Turkish fourth official that the game would have been a 'disaster' had he been put in charge. Chelsea legend Didier Drogba is siding with Jose Mourinho against his former club as the Fenerbahce boss is threatening legal action against Galatasaray .

arts.ttl: Drogba tells Galatasaray: Trust me, Mourinho is not a racist
arts.sum: Didier Drogba has defended Jose Mourinho over accusations of racism from Galatasaray in a message addressed to his former club.

arts.ttl: Didier Drogba backs 'dad' Mourinho in racism row as former Galatasaray star pledges Fenerbahce boss loyalty
arts.sum: The former Chelsea striker was clear he is on the side of his ex coach and current Fenerbahce boss

arts.ttl: Mourinho 'not a racist' - Drogba defends former boss
arts.sum: Didier Drogba defends former manager Jose Mourinho and insists the Portuguese is "not a racist" after Galatasaray accused the Fenerbahce manager of making "racist statements" following the 0-0 draw on Monday between the rivals.

arts.ttl: Didier Drogba speaks out after Galatasaray accuse Jose Mourinho of racism
arts.sum: Galatasaray outlined their intention to ‘initiate criminal proceedings concerning the racist statements made by Jose Mourinho’ after Monday’s game

arts.ttl: Jose Mourinho racism row: Chelsea legend Didier Drogba passionately defends Fenerbahce boss amid Galatasaray racism claims
arts.sum: Chelsea legend and former Galatasaray striker Didier Drogba passionately defends Jose Mourinho amid claims of racism from the Turkish Super Lig leaders.

arts.ttl: Didier Drogba defends Jose Mourinho against Galatasaray racism accusations
arts.sum: "How can my ‘Dad’ be a racist ... come on guys."

arts.ttl: Jose Mourinho faces Rangers dugout ban as Fenerbahce boss sweats with Galatasaray taking racism storm to UEFA
arts.sum: The Fenerbahce boss sparked outrage in the derby and the fallout is rumbling on
